body.content:
Hello! With Due Respect,

My name is Mrs. Alida Delbianco, I am from Croatia but was married to
Late Dr. Robin A. Carling, We were married for 32 years without a child.
My late husband was a businessman and Gold marchant but sadly, he was
poisoned by his business partners.  And Recently, My Doctor told me that
I will undergo a Surgery (Cancer of the Lung) and I may not survive it
or live longer than required due to my health condition.

I inherited a total sum of $15.2 Million USD. (Fifteen Million, Two
Hundred Thousand United State Dollars) from my late husband. He
deposited the money with a Bank in London in 2010. Having known my
condition, I have decided to donate this fund to any God fearing man or
woman who will use the money the way I am going to instruct. I want
somebody who will fulfil the desire of me and Robin, my late husband, to
help the less privileged people, orphanages and the widows in our
society. I took this decision because according to my history, I was
once an orphan who was raised from an orphanage home in America.

This is why I am taking this decision to hand over this fund to you in
good faith and to help the less privileged by opening a Foundation you
will call "ALIDA FOUNDATION". If you are interested in handling this
project, please give me your full names, address, profession and
telephone numbers for me to give it to my lawyer to prepare the
inheritance letter for you as soon as possible. I have a limited time to
live, I am not afraid of death, hence I know where I am going. I want
you to always remember me in your daily prayers because of my upcoming
Cancer of the Lung Surgery.

Kindly contact me through my private email id: (  iamalida2021@gmail.com
 ). If you are interested in carrying out this humanitarian duty.

Yours Sincerely
Mrs. Alida Delbianco
